channel.title: Egui Errors

item.title: Egui Errors
item.dc:creator: @dkd108 dkd108
item.description:
@dkd108 wrote:

ok i know that this has been posted before and all but all the topics are dead and did not help me. i get a EGUI in my run.bat which is expected because my main class is in there. but it says that the main class isnt in there. here is Run.bat coding

@echo off cd C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin @title Project Purple START JAVAW -Xmx500m EGUI

and here is the EGUI files main class coding

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“127.0.0.1”, “127.0.0.1”, “127.0.0.1”
});
}
}
[/code] can someone please help me with this i really wanna use this client, and yes i know that 127.0.0.1 is local IP address i just put it up as an example.

Read full topic
